title: Contact | Anton Ebsen
heading: Contact
text:
Do you have a question, an idea for a project, or just want to say hello?
Fill out the form below, and the message will land directly in my system.

form.name: Name
form.success: Thanks for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
form.errorAPI: An error occurred. Please try again later.
form.errorNet: Could not connect to the server.
